Posts.Content: Hi I think I'd get a second opinion. Surgeons just want to cut cut. Seems like there would be a med, ya know? Cathy

Posts.Content: Hi I was wondering is it warm to the touch or anything? When I was going thru puberty I kept getting these cysts they were really sore and would seep I was supposed to put hot compresses on them. Let us know what the dr says. Good luck cathy
